name: Little Town (alphanocten)
description:
As a fledgling indie game dev,  I completed the entirety of  this excellent Game Maker Studio 2 course  to learn how to program from scratch   (https://gamemaker.io/en/tutorials/little-town-gamemaker-tutorial) and added some modifications myself like a simple HUD, debugged audio/prompts/animations, the ability to restart and escape,  and expanded gameplay requiring turning in all 6 items to complete the game.

It's published here  just to see if I could complete a game start to finish and have it  as a playable download. 

Note: Contains PG-13 language and music lifted from Persona 4 Golden
